Summary: Small metallic orb about 30m off ground flying north-west at about 40 - 60 mph.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas cleaning windows one clear afternoon(1pm) in upstairs bedroom(2nd story)then from behind rooftops flies this metallic orb, it wasn't too shiny,more like polished lead in appearance.and not very big either,about size of large gym ball from my perspective.It moved relatively slow at about 40 - 60 mph toward the NW.I kept my eyes on it for about 1 min until it went out of site.No lights. No noise.Straight line. Strange.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ballyloughane Strand
This sighting has never been favorited.
